title: Integrated modeling of nature’s role in human well-being: A research agenda
content:
Publication date: September 2024

Source: Global Environmental Change, Volume 88

Author(s): Rebecca Chaplin-Kramer, Stephen Polasky, Rob Alkemade, Neil D. Burgess, William W.L. Cheung, Ingo Fetzer, Mike Harfoot, Thomas W. Hertel, Samantha L.L. Hill, Justin Andrew Johnson, Jan H.
